attributes.action: scrap plans to allow the courts to issue ASBO's to innocent people whom they suspect may commit a crime
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: hidden in the news today(15/01/07) was news that the govt. wants to be able to issue ASBO's to people who have not even committed a crime yet. This is the first step to a complete Police State.If you own a car capable of 100mph, they could use this legislation to issue a speeding ticket, even if you have never driven over the speed limit. you have the capability, and therefore are liable to commit the offence. this must be stopped!
